## CamelToHyphen type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type CamelToHyphen<T extends string, H extends string, P extends string = ''> = T extends `${infer F}${infer R}` ? F extends Uppercase<F> ? R extends '' ? `${P}${H}${Lowercase<F>}` : P extends '' ? CamelToHyphen<R, H, `${Lowercase<F>}`> : CamelToHyphen<R, H, `${P}${H}${Lowercase<F>}`> : R extends '' ? `${P}${F}` : CamelToHyphen<R, H, `${P}${F}`> : never;
```
